Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored his 30th T20I fifty
Rohit Sharma hit two trademark pulls off successive balls for his 599th and 600th sixes in international cricket
Rishabh Pant hit three sixes and two fours while scoring an unbeaten 36 off 26
Miscellaneous Highlights: India quicks led a demolition of Ireland on a fizzing pitch
Batting was difficult, if not outright dangerous
Arshdeep Singh, Mohammed Siraj, Jasprit Bumrah and Hardik Pandya picked up 8 for 81 between them
Others: India won by 8 wickets with 46 balls remaining
The match was played at New York, June 05, 2024, in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup
